info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Thunderstorm Will Rake Northern Pender County through 530 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willard, or near Burgaw, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, White Stocking, Penderlea, Maple Hill, Murray Town, Willard, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 401. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
